entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 04:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: WSW 23 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 14 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 10:59 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 near noon then light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:59 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 10:59 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
